item.name: Profile with fields exceed size limits

exec: // Test for errors array existence and non-empty

// Test that all errors have a "source" with "pointer" property
"The submitted data is not a valid value from the list of allowed values - Schema: default-v2.1.0",
"Amount must be less than or equal to 100 - Schema: default-v2.1.0",
"Amount must be less than or equal to 200 - Schema: default-v2.1.0",
"There are too many items in the array - Maximum is 100 - Schema: default-v2.1.0"
